data.actual_result: the android app user is disconnected from the target voicechannel or he is moved back to the start_vch
data.expected_result: the user should not be disconnected or moved
data.short_description: move an android discord user from a voice channel to a second one problem
data.steps_to_repro: - android app user: connect to a voice channel(start_vch) - Admin user: move the android user from start_vch to a different one(voiceChannel) possibility 1: - Admin user: lock the start_vch, start_vch -> Edit Channel -> Permissions -> @everyone:Connect disabled - the android app user is unjustly disconnected from the new voice channel(as if for discord he was in start_vch) possibility 2: - the android app user mute himself - the android app user automatically returns to the starting channel
